questionText: What is the primary benefit of using sponsored transactions on IOTA?

answerOptions.answerText: To avoid paying transaction fees altogether
To allow users to execute transactions without paying gas fees themselves
To reduce the gas price for all transactions
To increase the transaction speed on the IOTA network

questionText: In a user-initiated sponsored transaction, what step happens after the sponsor signs the TransactionData?

answerOptions.answerText: The user submits the signed transaction directly to a Full node
The sponsor sends the TransactionData and Signature back to the user
The transaction is broadcast to the network
The user constructs the GasData object
